condition.description: Estrogen protects bone density. Chemotherapy and some surgeries for breast cancer cause lower estrogen levels, so women who've had breast cancer are at higher risk of developing osteoporosis, or low bone mineral density. Doctors assess bone health with a bone mineral density test, and osteoporosis is treated with medications and calcium/vitamin D supplements. To lower your risk of osteoporosis, it's good to eat a diet high in calcium (from dairy products and dark, leafy greens) and vitamin D (from fatty fish and milk), and get regular, weight-bearing exercise.
condition.name: Osteoporosis in breast cancer

carousel_items: Take 1 tablet daily with or without food about the same time each day. It’s important to read the information you get with your medicine about how to take Evista.
Your doctor may tell you to take calcium and vitamin D with Evista to prevent osteoporosis (bone thinning and loss), especially if you don’t get enough in your diet.
Regular exercise, cutting back on smoking, and drinking less alcohol can also reduce your risk of bone loss.

basics.benefits_moa: Evista is a selective estrogen receptor modulator (SERM). It acts like estrogen to make your bones stronger and less likely to break, and also protects breast and uterus tissues from other estrogen effects.
basics.bottom_line: Evista is effective at reducing bone loss and lowering the risk of breast cancer in postmenopausal women, but does carry the risk of blood clots.
downsides: Can only take Evista once you’re in menopause. You can't take it if you're pregnant or breastfeeding.
Evista isn’t as effective as tamoxifen at lowering the risk of invasive breast cancer.
Shouldn’t take it with any other forms of estrogen (pills, patches, or injection).
It doesn’t increase bone strength as much as estrogen does and isn’t effective for treating hot flashes.

downsides_processed.orig: Can only take Evista once you’re in menopause. You can't take it if you're pregnant or breastfeeding.
Evista isn’t as effective as tamoxifen at lowering the risk of invasive breast cancer.
Shouldn’t take it with any other forms of estrogen (pills, patches, or injection).
It doesn’t increase bone strength as much as estrogen does and isn’t effective for treating hot flashes.

upsides: Evista doesn’t affect the breast or uterus the same way that estrogen does, so the risk of cancer is much lower.
Taking Evista with calcium and vitamin D improves spine and hip bone health and lowers the risk of fractures.
Lowers total cholesterol and low-density lipoprotein (LDL) cholesterol (the bad cholesterol).

upsides_processed.orig: Evista doesn’t affect the breast or uterus the same way that estrogen does, so the risk of cancer is much lower.
Taking Evista with calcium and vitamin D improves spine and hip bone health and lowers the risk of fractures.
Lowers total cholesterol and low-density lipoprotein (LDL) cholesterol (the bad cholesterol).

drugs.one_liner: Prevents bone loss and lowers your risk of breast cancer.
drugs.name: Evista

carousel_items_processed.orig: Take 1 tablet daily with or without food about the same time each day. It’s important to read the information you get with your medicine about how to take Evista.
Your doctor may tell you to take calcium and vitamin D with Evista to prevent osteoporosis (bone thinning and loss), especially if you don’t get enough in your diet.
Regular exercise, cutting back on smoking, and drinking less alcohol can also reduce your risk of bone loss.

risks_warnings.title: Increased risk of stroke
risks_warnings.description: Evista can cause increase the risk of stroke. The risk is greater in women with a history of stroke or TIA, who have heart disease, atrial fibrillation, high blood pressure and who smoke.

description_processed.orig: Evista can cause increase the risk of stroke. The risk is greater in women with a history of stroke or TIA, who have heart disease, atrial fibrillation, high blood pressure and who smoke.

risks_warnings.title: Increased risk of blood clots
risks_warnings.description: Evista can increase your risk of getting a blood clot. Let your doctor know if you plan to have surgery or a procedure where you'll need extended bed rest. You may need to stop taking Evista during this time. Try to move around if you travel for any length of time (plane, train, car) to prevent getting a blood clot.

description_processed.orig: Evista can increase your risk of getting a blood clot. Let your doctor know if you plan to have surgery or a procedure where you'll need extended bed rest. You may need to stop taking Evista during this time. Try to move around if you travel for any length of time (plane, train, car) to prevent getting a blood clot.

risks_warnings.title: Elevated triglycerides (fats in blood)
risks_warnings.description: Evista can increase triglycerides in women who already have elevated levels. Your doctor will need to monitor your levels before and during your treatment if you decide to take Evista.

description_processed.orig: Evista can increase triglycerides in women who already have elevated levels. Your doctor will need to monitor your levels before and during your treatment if you decide to take Evista.

risks_warnings.title: Worsening kidney or liver function
risks_warnings.description: Evista is processed by the kidney and liver. If you have kidney or liver problems, talk to your doctor because you may need a different dose.

description_processed.orig: Evista is processed by the kidney and liver. If you have kidney or liver problems, talk to your doctor because you may need a different dose.

carousel_items: Remember to get your shot every 6 months. Write it down on your calendar.
If your doctor also told you to take calcium and vitamin D, remember to take them as well. They'll work with Prolia to help protect your bones.
Can cause skin irritation, joint pain, limb pain, and back pain.
Let your doctor know if you start getting more infections.
Let your dentist know that you’re taking Prolia since it can cause problems in the jaw bone after dental procedures.

basics.benefits_moa: Prolia is a monoclonal antibody. It blocks a protein that sends signals to break down your bones, and therefore prevents bone loss.
basics.bottom_line: Prolia is an effective and convenient treatment for osteoporosis if other options haven’t worked or aren’t appropriate for you. There’re risks of some rare side effects, so make sure you're following up with your doctor regularly.
downsides: Approved for women only after they’ve reached menopause. Don’t use this if you’re pregnant or planning to become pregnant.
Can lower blood calcium levels. You might need to take calcium supplements to prevent this.

downsides_processed.orig: Approved for women only after they’ve reached menopause. Don’t use this if you’re pregnant or planning to become pregnant.
Can lower blood calcium levels. You might need to take calcium supplements to prevent this.

upsides: Prolia is effective at preventing bone loss, making your bones stronger and lowering your chance of getting a fracture.
Only need to get an injection every 6 months, so you don’t have to remember to take something every day.

upsides_processed.orig: Prolia is effective at preventing bone loss, making your bones stronger and lowering your chance of getting a fracture.
Only need to get an injection every 6 months, so you don’t have to remember to take something every day.

userStories.tip: That there is nothing you can do to get it out of your system. Side effects for six months is unacceptable.  And the side effects are not worth what the drug is supposed to do. I wish I had known and the doctor had been more forthcoming

drugs.name: Prolia

labeled_indications.indication: Bone loss in men at high risk of fracture

carousel_items_processed.orig: Remember to get your shot every 6 months. Write it down on your calendar.
If your doctor also told you to take calcium and vitamin D, remember to take them as well. They'll work with Prolia to help protect your bones.
Can cause skin irritation, joint pain, limb pain, and back pain.
Let your doctor know if you start getting more infections.
Let your dentist know that you’re taking Prolia since it can cause problems in the jaw bone after dental procedures.

risks_warnings.title: Leg bone fractures
risks_warnings.description: Some people who take Prolia have had unusual thigh fractures. However, it’s unclear if Prolia causes these fractures. Report any unusual hip, thigh, or groin pain to your doctor.

description_processed.orig: Some people who take Prolia have had unusual thigh fractures. However, it’s unclear if Prolia causes these fractures. Report any unusual hip, thigh, or groin pain to your doctor.

risks_warnings.title: Hypersensitivity (allergic) reactions
risks_warnings.description: Prolia has been linked to allergic reactions. Seek medical attention immediately if you start getting throat tightness, swelling of the face, difficulty breathing, hives, or a drop in your blood pressure.

description_processed.orig: Prolia has been linked to allergic reactions. Seek medical attention immediately if you start getting throat tightness, swelling of the face, difficulty breathing, hives, or a drop in your blood pressure.

risks_warnings.title: Low calcium blood levels
risks_warnings.description: Prolia can lower calcium levels in your blood. If you have low calcium levels, your doctor will want to correct this level before you start Prolia. Even if your levels are normal, your doctor will probably tell you to take calcium and vitamin D supplements daily in addition to getting your Prolia shots. Remember to take your supplements regularly, and get blood tests as directed by your doctor to make sure your calcium levels are normal.
risk_factors: Taking other medicines that can lower calcium blood levels
History of hypoparathyroidism (low levels of parathyroid hormone)

description_processed.orig: Prolia can lower calcium levels in your blood. If you have low calcium levels, your doctor will want to correct this level before you start Prolia. Even if your levels are normal, your doctor will probably tell you to take calcium and vitamin D supplements daily in addition to getting your Prolia shots. Remember to take your supplements regularly, and get blood tests as directed by your doctor to make sure your calcium levels are normal.

risks_warnings.title: Infection
risks_warnings.description: Patients taking Prolia have reported getting more infections. The type of infections they get can vary and have involved the skin, stomach, urinary tract, ears, gums, or heart. Let your doctor know if you start getting an unusual or severe infection.
risk_factors: Taking medicines that block your immune system (such as transplant medications or steroids)

description_processed.orig: Patients taking Prolia have reported getting more infections. The type of infections they get can vary and have involved the skin, stomach, urinary tract, ears, gums, or heart. Let your doctor know if you start getting an unusual or severe infection.

risks_warnings.title: Problems in the jaw bone
risks_warnings.description: Prolia has been associated with severe jaw bone problems. Make sure to take good care of your teeth while you're on Prolia, and let your dentist know that you're taking this medicine. If you start noticing any pain, swelling, or an infection in your jaw, talk to your doctor right away.

description_processed.orig: Prolia has been associated with severe jaw bone problems. Make sure to take good care of your teeth while you're on Prolia, and let your dentist know that you're taking this medicine. If you start noticing any pain, swelling, or an infection in your jaw, talk to your doctor right away.

risks_warnings.title: Pain in the bones and muscles
risks_warnings.description: Some people who take Prolia start feeling bone, joint, or muscle pain. This could happen anywhere from a day to several months after starting Prolia. Let your doctor know if you notice these symptoms and they're very severe.

description_processed.orig: Some people who take Prolia start feeling bone, joint, or muscle pain. This could happen anywhere from a day to several months after starting Prolia. Let your doctor know if you notice these symptoms and they're very severe.
